title: 求我的世界1.12MOD
author: 凶吗小棉袜
txt_content: 求我的世界1.12MODS 或整合包。。谢谢，，

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content: 温馨提示：1.12forge和mod均为测试版，请谨慎使用

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
给你几个当下最流行的个mod
1旅行地图 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/journeymap-32274
2 存储抽屉 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/storage-drawers
3 存储抽屉前置 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chameleon
存储抽屉附属https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/storage-drawers-extras（注意此mod需要林业，自然，超多生物群系，沉浸工程mod当中的一个才会有效果））
4 铁箱子（论坛译名”更好的箱子”）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/iron-chests
5 CMM-自定义主界面 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/custom-main-menu
6资源加载器 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/resource-loader
7JEI-物品管理器 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/just-enough-items-jei
8 RFTOOLS(rf 工具)前置 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/mcjtylib
9 RFTOOLS  （RF工具本体）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/rftools
10 睡眠mod(基友或多人联机的好mod，10个人只需要3个睡一觉就可以天亮)https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/morpheus
11 FTB LIB (实为FTB整合包作者的mod，可以联机使用，可以认领区块等等）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ftblib （注意它只是个前置）
12 FTB Utilities(此为本体  )https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ftb-utilities
13 Better Builder's Wands（更好的建筑之杖）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/better-builders-wands
14 AutoRegLib （夸克，psi等前置）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/autoreglib
15  Quark （夸克本体）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/quark
16 PSI （本体）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/psi
17 GraveStone Mod( 墓碑 )https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/gravestone-mod
18Actually Additions( 实用拓展)https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/actually-additions
19Refined Storage(精致存储仿)AE https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/refined-storage
20 极限反应堆（大型反应堆前身）https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/extreme-reactors
21 极限反应堆前置 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/zerocore
22 科技重生,史蒂夫工厂等前置https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/reborncore
史蒂夫工厂重置版https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/steves-carts-reborn
23 科技重生 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/techreborn
24 超多生物群系 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/biomes-o-plenty
25搬箱器 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chest-transporter
26 电梯 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/openblocks-elevator
27 JEI附属 https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... nough-resources-jer
28 更好的FPS https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/betterfps
29 方块显示 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/hwyla
30 方块显示附属高亮显示https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... t-are-we-looking-at
31 方块显示附属 采掘信息 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/waila-harvestability
32 矿石开采比连锁挖矿更好用 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ore-excavation
33 X网络（简单的管道模组） https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/xnet
其实1.12还有很多，我就不一一给你介绍了，另外就是这些mod绝大部分的汉化已经失效，原因为1.11以后物品什么的都使用小写了，也有没有汉化的
https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... ter-sort=popularity
1.12目前有20页，这个地址楼主可以自己去看
